mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.cover, cd.description, CONVERT(c.price, DECIMAL(8,2)) AS price, s1.title AS levelOne, s2.title AS levelTwo, t.name AS teacherName FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_course_description cd ON c.id=cd.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s1 ON c.subject_parent_id = s1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s2 ON c.subject_id = s2.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
